item.title: JAX: Tales from production
item.description: JAX: Tales from production # In a second presentation Peter RoÃbach together with Andreas Schmidt provided some more detail on what the topic logging entails in real world projects. Development messages turn into valuable information needed to uncover issues and downtime of systems, capacity planning, measuring the effect of software changes, analysing resource usage under real world usage. In addition to these technical use cases there is a need to provide business metrics.
